function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unchecked mobility in public places leading to potential disease spread","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Implementing mobility control measures and checkpoints to monitor and record mobility","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, temperature scanning, registration systems","People":"General public, visitors, employees, shoppers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate safety measures in social spaces leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease spread within social spaces","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection, hygiene maintenance, waste management, and monitoring of physical distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, hygiene products, monitoring systems","People":"Residents, visitors, social space operators","Owner":"Local government, property management, community organizations"}]}
